channel.title: Lol my story
channel.description: lol ok well I was in search of a free webhost so I went to google. After typing in what I wanted I went to the 1st site that came up. it was something like http://free-web-hosting.com. Ok well I made a site and used no-ip to redirect so cool I had http://scapearchives.no-ip.org. GEAT! I said lol. But I wasnt satisfied I needed a domain well since my servers name is weedscape i decided to buy http://weedscape.net well I merged with another server called SoulScape. We decided to instead of having a server site to just make a new community and have ArchScape (new name of merged server) promote it. Well since I had weedscape.net it wouldnt work because the name of this new community is "ScapeArchives". Well looks like we needed another redirect. So our webmaster (raiden) made [b]http://scapearchives.net.ms[/b] and now we have finally set everything up and are ready for business! so please at least signup and check it out. give me feedback please also. But I kinda thought this was a good story that only took like 6 days to happen.

well this is a old post it is now ScapeArchives.net and I am the Owner And my server was SoulScape

item.title: Lol my story
item.dc:creator: @demon_54 demon_54
item.description:
@demon_54 wrote:

lol ok well I was in search of a free webhost so I went to google. After typing in what I wanted I went to the 1st site that came up. it was something like http://free-web-hosting.com. Ok well I made a site and used no-ip to redirect so cool I had http://scapearchives.no-ip.org. GEAT! I said lol. But I wasnt satisfied I needed a domain well since my servers name is weedscape i decided to buy http://weedscape.net well I merged with another server called SoulScape. We decided to instead of having a server site to just make a new community and have ArchScape (new name of merged server) promote it. Well since I had weedscape.net it wouldnt work because the name of this new community is “ScapeArchives”. Well looks like we needed another redirect. So our webmaster (raiden) made http://scapearchives.net.ms and now we have finally set everything up and are ready for business! so please at least signup and check it out. give me feedback please also. But I kinda thought this was a good story that only took like 6 days to happen.

Read full topic
